data: PED NEPH AMB Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent For Non-Dialysis Chronic Kidney Disease
Patient Care
Weight
once
Notify Treating Provider
If change in hemoglobin is greater than or equal to 20 g/L, if hemoglobin is less than 109 g/L or drop of 20 g/L
Medications

Recommended initial dose:   1) epoetin alpha  - Less than 2 years of age: 350 units/kg/week  - 2 to 5 years old: 275 units/kg/week  - 6 to 12 years old: 250 units/kg/week  - Greater than 12 years of age: 200 units/kg/week  2) darbepoetin 0.45 mcg/kg/week (round to the nearest syringe size)
Follow the BC Children's Chronic Kidney Disease Non-Dialysis Anemia Management Protocol
Communication Order
Follow the BC Children's Chronic Kidney Disease Non-Dialysis Anemia Management Protocol
